How Do I Checkout Code (for Novices)

I'll assume that you have done the following:
a. Install the latest version of Eclipse.
b. Install the Android SDK.
c. Install the ADT plug-in for Eclipse.
d. Install the subversion plug-in for Eclipse Subclipse (the one we use).

Check out code

Add ANDROID_LIB to project point to android.jar
